targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(caller)
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Procedure' AND commandkey = 'Apple juice procedure' AND commandstate = 'Completed'

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "PackML State"
FROM etpackmlstates
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell' AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer"
FROM etpackmlstates
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer' AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder"
FROM etpackmlstates
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder'AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer/Apple_juice_feeder"
FROM etpackmlstates
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer/Apple_juice_feeder' AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer/Sugar_solution_tank"

WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer/Sugar_solution_tank' AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL

WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer/Apple_juice_feeder/Apple_juice_feeeder_pump'AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1

  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer/Apple_juice_feeder/Apple_juice_feeder_valve"

  statechangetime AS "time",

WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer/Sugar_solution_tank/Sugar_solution_feeder_valve'AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer/Apple_juice_mixing_tank/Apple_juice_mixing_agitator"

FROM etpackmlstates
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer/Apple_juice_transfer_line/Apple_juice_transfer_valve'AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1

  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_feeder_tank"
FROM etpackmlstates
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_feeder_tank'AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1

  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_mixing_tank"

  statechangetime AS "time",

FROM etpackmlstates
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_feeder_tank/Vitamine_C_pump'AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1

  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_feeder_tank/Vitamine_C_valve"
FROM etpackmlstates
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_feeder_tank/Vitamine_C_valve'AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_mixing_tank/Vitamine_c_mixing_agitator"
FROM etpackmlstates
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_mixing_tank/Vitamine_c_mixing_agitator'AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL

  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_mixing_tank/Vitamine_C_cooler"
FROM etpackmlstates
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_mixing_tank/Vitamine_C_cooler'AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS "time",
  newname AS "Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Mixed_apple_juice_transfer_line/Mixed_apple_juice_transfer_valve"
FROM etpackmlstates
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Mixed_apple_juice_transfer_line/Mixed_apple_juice_transfer_valve'AND statechangetime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  statechangetime AS "time",
  caller AS "Caller",
  commandkey AS "Command",
  commandstate AS "State",
  CAST(result AS STRING) AS "Result"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Procedure'
ORDER BY statechangetime DESC

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  caller AS "Caller",
  commandkey AS "Command",
  commandstate AS "State",
  CAST(result AS STRING) AS "Result"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Unit Procedure'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  caller AS "Caller",
  commandkey AS "Command",
  commandstate AS "State",
  CAST(result AS STRING) AS "Result"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Operation'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  caller AS "Caller",
  commandkey AS "Command",
  commandstate AS "State",
  CAST(result AS STRING) AS "Result"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Phase'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Procedure' AND commandkey = 'Apple juice procedure'
order by statechangetime DESC

SELECT COUNT(caller)
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Unit Procedure' AND commandkey = 'Apple_Juice_mixing_unit_procedure' AND commandstate = 'Completed'

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Unit Procedure' AND commandkey = 'Apple_Juice_mixing_unit_procedure'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Unit Procedure' AND commandkey = 'Vitamine_C_addition_unit_procedure'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Operation' AND commandkey = 'Apple_juice_feed_operation'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Operation' AND commandkey = 'Apple_juice_transfer_operation'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Operation' AND commandkey = 'Apple_juice_cooling_operation'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Operation' AND commandkey = 'Mixed_apple_juice_transfer_operation'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Operation' AND commandkey = 'Mixed_apple_juice_cooling_operation'
order by time_index DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Operation' AND commandkey = 'Vitamine_C_addition_operation'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Phase' AND commandkey = 'Feed_apple_juice_phase'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Phase' AND commandkey = 'transfer_apple_juice_phase'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Phase' AND commandkey = 'Cool_apple_juice_phase'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Phase' AND commandkey = 'Transfer_mixed_apple_juice_phase'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Phase' AND commandkey = 'Cool_mixed_apple_juice_phase'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Phase' AND commandkey = 'Agitate_mixed_apple_juice_phase'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Phase' AND commandkey = 'Feed_sugar_solution_phase'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Phase' AND commandkey = 'Add_vitamine_C_pahse'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT 
  statechangetime AS time,
  commandstate AS "State"
FROM etproceduralelementstates
WHERE elementtype = 'Phase' AND commandkey = 'Agitate_apple_juice_phase'
order by time_index DESC limit 1

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  caller AS "caller",
  executer AS "Executer",
  commandkey AS "Command",
  commandstate AS "State",
  CAST(result AS STRING) AS "Result",
  CAST(duration AS STRING) AS "Duration"
FROM etcommandstates
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  caller AS "caller",
  executer AS "Executer",
  commandkey AS "Command",
  commandstate AS "State",
  CAST(result AS STRING) AS "Result",
  CAST(duration AS STRING) AS "Duration"
FROM etcommandstates
WHERE result <> 0 AND result <> 2147483647
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT 
  time_index AS "time",
  CAST(value AS FLOAT) AS "Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_mixing_tank"
FROM ettelemetryvalues
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_mixing_tank'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  time_index AS "time",
  CAST(value AS FLOAT) AS "Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer/Apple_juice_mixing_tank"
FROM ettelemetryvalues
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer/Apple_juice_mixing_tank'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  time_index AS "time",
  CAST(value AS FLOAT) AS "Vitamine C mixing tank"
FROM ettelemetryvalues
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Vitamine_C_adder/Vitamine_C_mixing_tank'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  time_index AS "time",
  CAST(value AS FLOAT) AS "Apple juice mixing tank"
FROM ettelemetryvalues
WHERE treepath = 'Testmachine_Cell/Apple_juice_mixer/Apple_juice_mixing_tank'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  lastchangetime AS "time",
  uid AS "UID",
  description AS "Description"
FROM eteventsvalues
ORDER BY lastchangetime desc
